text:
As the owner of Ferragold TCM Group Clinics , we consistently uphold the principles of transparency and integrity. Regarding recent inaccurate comments about our Tui Na (therapeutic massage) pricing, we hereby clarify: Our clinic's pricing strictly adheres to industry standards and is comprehensively determined based on practitioner qualifications, service duration, and personalized treatment plans. Our Tui Na services are performed by professional massage therapists, integrating traditional techniques with targeted therapeutic approaches – fundamentally distinct from generic massage services.

We deeply regret any unverified misleading statements and reserve the right to pursue legal actions. Customers seeking detailed information are welcome to contact us or visit for firsthand experience – authentic testimonials will naturally reflect our quality. We also kindly urge the public not to misinterpret the essence of Traditional Chinese Medicine culture through fragmented claims. Thank you for your understanding and support!
